name: Cross Over
text: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and 1 Warrior monster you control; equip that face-up opponent's monster to that monster you control, and if you do, your opponent takes no battle damage from attacks involving that monster you control until the end of this turn. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy the monster equipped to it by this effect instead. You can only activate 1 "Cross Over" per turn.
